vibuy--share-component.styles: position: absolute; top: 125px; left: 910px; cursor: pointer;

vibuy--share-icon.styles: background: url(/images/share.svg) center / cover no-repeat; display: inline-block; width: 18px; height: 18px;

vibuy--share-text.styles: font-family: Source Sans Pro; font-size: 12px; text-align: left; color: #FFF; position: absolute; top: 5px; left: 25px;
